segments.advisor_message: Alright, so uh, can you tell me, do you own or rent your home? You know, I just need some basic deets here.
segments.client_message: Um, yeah, I own my house, it's a little.... um, 3-bedroom, you know, in the suburb area.

segments.advisor_message: Got it, got it. And, uh, what's the address? Like, street name and, um, maybe the town or city?
segments.client_message: Oh, sure! It's on Maple Street, in, uh, Springfield, and the ZIP code is 62704... I think.
